pkgmetadata.longdescription: R companion to "Curve and Surface Fitting with Splines" // This package provides a wrapper to the FITPACK routines written by Paul Dierckx. The original Fortran is available from http://www.netlib.org/dierckx 2012.02.15: This package is broken. Currently, it seems NOT to have any users and is not worth fixing.
